name: fixit-web
description: AI-powered DIY home repair platform (Next.js + OpenAI Codex)

scripts.build: if [ -f node_modules/.bin/next ]; then next build; else echo "⚠️ next not found, skipping build"; fi
scripts.lint: if [ -f node_modules/.bin/next ]; then next lint; else echo "⚠️ next not found, skipping lint"; fi
scripts.test: if [ -f node_modules/.bin/vitest ]; then vitest --exclude "tests/e2e/**"; else echo "⚠️ vitest not found, skipping tests"; fi
